original_text: Then Saul arose, and went down to the wilderness of Ziph, having three thousand chosen men of Israel with him, to seek David in the wilderness of Ziph.
korean_text: 사울이 일어나 십 광야에서 다윗을 찾으려고 이스라엘에서 택한 사람 삼천 명과 함께 십 광야로 내려가서

sentences.original_text: and went down to wilderness of Ziph
having three thousand chosen men of Israel with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그와 함께 이스라엘의 택한 병사 삼천 명을 데리고

sentences.original_text: to seek David in wilderness of Ziph
